messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle check for wednesday pm hello please double needs approve has submitted july st pm did receive sum column labels row labels grand total submitted submitted grand total thanks regards officer registered st floor registration vat social wednesday pm aw hi approved which queue needs approved thanks best regards good morning please approve were submitted figures imported approved included sum column labels row labels grand total submitted submitted grand total thank officer registered st floor registration vat social
